title: 坠入深渊
content:
[[>]]
[[module Rate]]
[[/>]]

= [[size x-large]]时间在黑暗与寂静中冻结[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]我又一次成为了身陷囹圄的困兽[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]虚无与缥缈钻入我冰冷的骨[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]我彷徨踟躇[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]直至梦境的边缘 [[/size]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 40%; padding: 0 45%;font-size:50px"]]
我
[[/div]]

[[div style="float:left; width: 40%; padding: 0 35%;font-size:42px;font-color:#3c3c3c"]]
坠
[[/div]]
@@ @@

[[div style="float:left; width: 40%; padding: 0 25%;font-size:40px;font-color:#5B5B5B"]]
入
[[/div]]

@@ @@
@@ @@

[[div style="float:left; width: 40%; padding: 0 35%;font-size:35px;font-color:#7B7B7B"]]
了
[[/div]]
[[image http://scpsandboxcn.wikidot.com/local--files/dead-cat/bc%282%29.png]]


= [[size x-large]]时间再度开始流转[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]梦离开了[[/size]]

= [[size x-large]]而我正回到另一个深渊中去.##444444|.####666666|.####888888|.####AAAAAA|.####DDDDDD|.##[[/size]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@

= [[size large]]##DDDDDD|魔鬼扯断了她的花茎##[[/size]]
= [[size large]]##DDDDDD|现在轮到我了。##[[/size]]

@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
@@ @@
author: CrowNox
